reviews.text: Pretty average rooms. While new, the rooms lacked both charm and natural light (ie. one of the bedrooms had no window at all).
reviews.title: Not that great - very noisy

reviews.text: The room was obviously furnished on the cheap and somewhat poorly thought out. There was only a two seater couch for a two bedroom apartment which was a bit of an oversight.
reviews.title: Fantastic Apartment In the middle of the city

reviews.text: The in-room internet was a bit of an overpriced rip off even compared with the usual high hotel pricing.
reviews.title: Nice apartment

reviews.text: The street outside was extremely noisy at night with loud noise from the bars until the early hours of the morning.
reviews.title: Thoroughly satisfied
